message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, and this is a fair price reflecting its worth.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product.  This is still a fair price considering its value to me, and it leaves some room for us to come to an agreement. Let me know what you think.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I see you're serious about this product.  While $13,500 is a fair starting point, I know the true value of what I'm offering. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still very interested in this product, but $14,000 is a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $13,750?  This would be a fair compromise for both of us.
